content.query:
USE clinical_gold;
GO


dROP VIEW gold.subject_risk_summary ;
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'subject_risk_summary',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ADLS_GOLD',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS src;

-- Demographics summary
DROP VIEW gold.demographics_summary 
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'demographics_summary',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ADLS_GOLD',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS src;

-- Lab efficiency
DROP VIEW gold.lab_efficiency 
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'lab_efficiency',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ADLS_GOLD',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS src;

-- AE summary
DROP VIEW gold.ae_summary 
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'ae_summary',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ADLS_GOLD',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS src;

-- Efficacy change
DROP VIEW gold.efficacy_change_all
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'efficacy_change',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'ADLS_GOLD',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS src;
